Package com.example.ex_motricite

Class DateValidator

java.lang.Object
com.example.ex_motricite.DateValidator
public class DateValidator extends Object
The DateValidator class provides a helper for validating date strings. It includes a method, isValid(String), to check if a given date string is valid.

The class uses a regular expression to compare the date string with the expected format "dd/MM/yyyy".

Author: Rgouaud Version: 1.0

      Returns:
